did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Three daybooks from Christiansburg wholesaler in feed, seed and other agricultural products, providing names, dates, goods purchased, and prices for each transaction.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Harkrader Produce Company Account Books must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Harkrader Produce Company Account Books, Ms1940-014, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Harkrader Produce Company Account Books were aquired by Newman Library prior to 1941.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Harkrader Produce Company Account Books commenced and was completed in February, 2011.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Harkrader Produce Company was established by Robert R. and Paul D. Hardrader at 106 North Franklin Street in Christiansburg, Virginia in the 1920s. The business seems to have been a wholesaler, emphasizing on seed, but also sold feed, fertilizer, poultry and other agricultural products. Harkrader Produce Company closed in 1973.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of three daybooks from the Harkrader Produce Company, a Christiansburg, Virginia wholesaler of feed, seed and other agricultural products. Each volume contains entries detailing transaction dates, names of purchasers, goods purchased, and prices.
